channel.title: routine on MBS
channel.description: Recent content in routine on MBS

item.title: daily azkar
item.description: Daily Azkar means the zikr that I should do on daily basis. First one is after fajar prayer. After each prayer 33xSubhan Allah, 33xAlhamdulillah,34xAllah o Akbar. For increase in knowledge. A very powerful daily tasbeeh is 100 times Subhanallahi Wa bi hamdihi. Surah e Ikhlas equals one-third of Quran. Durood e Ibrahimi

item.title: daily azkar
item.description: Daily Azkar means the zikr that I should do on daily basis. First one is after fajar prayer. After each prayer 33xSubhan Allah, 33xAlhamdulillah,34xAllah o Akbar. For increase in knowledge. A very powerful daily tasbeeh is 100 times Subhanallahi Wa bi hamdihi. Surah e Ikhlas equals one-third of Quran. Durood e Ibrahimi

item.title: a typical friday
item.description: Yes a friday. I wake up goto office. around juma prayer time i goto to prayer at mosque. i come back i spend time in office. i go back to asar maghrib isha i goto to home for dinner and sleep. Technically, I should wake up at Fajar recite Surah e Yaseen, do ghusl, off to office then before juma prayer, I should recite Surah e Kahaf and then Juma prayer, return back to office and then off around Asar and Maghrib prayer.
